name: Shoot! Asteroids!
description:
Have you ever been flying your spaceship, minding your own business, when all of a sudden you find yourself in the middle of an asteroid field? And then you have no option but to shoot every asteroid in sight, which seems like an endless task. I can't count the number of times it's happened to me. This game is a simulation of that exact situation... only with power ups... and less actual dying.

Features

  • 4 Unique ships and colors to unlock
  • Power-ups to repair and shield your ship
  • Rapid laser attacks help clear the way
  • Auto-save makes it (slightly) easier to put down and come back to later
  • Autofire toggle, so you need not mash the "fire" button
  • Ship automatically upgrades after every level...
  • ... And so do the asteroids
  • Casual game play
